title: kled bundle
body:
umm sorry but i found out kled&sir kled skin is 975rp
But, instead of buying bundle, i bought a kled champion only.
so, i hope you rioters can give me the skin

replies.body: If you have any refund tokens left, you can refund Kled per the refund policy.  You should be able to purchase the bundle from there!  Have fun!
:( I dont have any:( if you are a rioter can you give me one?
